text: mene sabse jyda time spend tere sath kiya h meethe h. hall 4  jana . 1st year ke last me domino's jana. or raat ko campus ki roads pr ghoomna sath me. tera jabardasti gali dekar uthana .  ye sab me bahut miss karne vala hu. tu bahut bhola ensan h re meethi se sation pr milne ke liye tujhe kitni muskil se  manaya tha. fir jo dono ke chahre pr khusi thi vo aaj bhi yaad h mujhe. 2nd year ke summer me bahut aam, jamun  thod kar khaye the . or me jab bhi problem tha tu sath tha mere . body se tu strong h pr tu bahut sweet h
author: Rajani  Meena
